Simon Cowells brother reportedly wont be attending the entertainment moguls upcoming wedding to Lauren Silverman after the two previously 'fell out' a source has claimed.

articles.author: Codie Bullen
articles.title: 'It used to be cocaine and strippers': Robbie Williams swaps rock star lifestyle for painting - Daily Mail
articles.description: The singer, 48, has spoke out about the positive impact painting has had on his mental health. He revealed that when he spends time working on his art it silences the voices in his head.
articles.content:
Robbie Williams has revealed he's swapped his rock star lifestyle for painting as he's expected to fetch £20,000 for one piece of artwork.
